entry.title: cryptographic review requested
entry.summary: In an email exchange dated 23rd September 2014 between Mem Wallet and Pavol Rusnak, they discuss a proposed change to BIP44 to include identity keys for structured wallets. Mem Wallet suggests creating a new BIP for describing the HD paths used for ECIES, which is a working implementation available at http://memwallet.info/btcmssgs.html. Pavol Rusnak agrees that the implementation seems complete and suggests pushing it as a new BIP to be reviewed and standardized promptly.
